org.gearvrf

Class GVRImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRImage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GVRBitmapTexture, GVRCompressedCubemapTexture, GVRCompressedTexture, GVRCubemapTexture, GVRFloatTexture, GVRImageAtlas

    public class GVRImage
extends GVRHybridObject
    Encapsulates the data used to construct a GVRTexture. An image can be a simple bitmap, a compressed bitmap, a cubemap (6 separate bitmaps for each cube face) or a compressed cubemap (6 compressed bitmaps). Images are typically read in from files using the @{link GVRAssetLoader} but it is also possible to create them programatically.
